title: Art and Text
description: This class is for the advanced visual arts major devoted to the study and practice of the multiple ways in which writing and other forms of visible language have been incorporated into contemporary and traditional artworks, including artists’ books, collaging and poster art, literature and poetry, typographical experiments, and calligraphies. Two production-course limitation. Prerequisites: senior standing. Open to media, studio, ICAM, and speculative design majors.
